display.name: Ai PDF
display.description: Ai PDF GPT (Top PDF GPT), can handle PDF documents up to 2GB PER FILE, allows 1000s of PDF uploads on myaidrive.com with a free account. It eliminates the need for repeated file uploads. PRO version can search across 1000s of PDFs and OCR documents. Provides superior summaries for lengthy documents.
prompt_starters: How will I upload and search my documents?
How is it different from file upload option in ChatGPT?
How to search across multiple files?
Can I still use AI PDF plugin?
